abstract: Data contained within reports released by Commerce Dept and other agencies suggests there has been sharp slowdown in economic growth in United States; housing still remains high, as home prices continue to accelerate.
lead_paragraph: A decline in consumer confidence and in business spending casts doubt on whether the Federal Reserve will raise interest rates this year.

headline.main: Raft of Data Suggests Growth Is Slowing
headline.print_headline: Raft of Data Suggests Growth Is Slowing

snippet: A decline in consumer confidence and in business spending casts doubt on whether the Federal Reserve will raise interest rates this year.
